After doing a fair amount of research, I just can't seem to find a viable w=
ay to test classes that are loaded during test-time. For example, my use ca=
se is launching some tests from an Eclipse plugin test for code-generated c=
lasses.

This situation is actually more difficult under JUnit4 because of =
reliance on annotations. I can't find a path that doesn't require class nam=
es to exist at compile time. Am I missing something?
